snippet.title: Atomic Picnic - Official Overview Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description:
Get a deep dive into Atomic Picnic in this explainer trailer for the upcoming co-op roguelike shooter game. Check it out to see what to expect from Atomic Picnic, including 4-player co-op gameplay, a look at various weapons, curios and upgrades. Atomic Picnic is coming to PC. 
In Atomic Picnic, swing and dash across the wasteland to slay monsters, smash loot pinatas, and synergize your upgrades with powerful weapons.
